languages.text: {n}Идира вздрагивает, обмякает и, растерянно моргая, переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Л-лорд-капитан..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира повисает на руке "Теодоры" и, растерянно моргая, смотрит на вас.{/n} "Л-лорд-капитан..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира вздрагивает, обмякает и, растерянно моргая, переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Л-лорд-капитан..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Indira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉颤抖着，浑身瘫软。随后她眨了眨眼，看着你，眼神中充满了迷惑。{/n}“舰——舰长大人……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉颤抖着，浑身瘫软。随后她眨了眨眼，看着你，眼神中充满了迷惑。{/n}“舰——舰长大人……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se estremece y se queda sin fuerzas. Después parpadea, desorientada, y te mira.{/n} «L-Lord Capitán...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se estremece y se queda sin fuerzas. Después parpadea, desorientada, y te mira.{/n} «L-Lord Capitán...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは体を震わせ、ぐったりする。そして、混乱したかのようにまばたきをしつつ、あなたを見る。{/n}「ロ…ロード・キャプテン…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは体を震わせ、ぐったりする。そして、混乱したかのようにまばたきをしつつ、あなたを見る。{/n}「ロ…ロード・キャプテン…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira zittert und erschlafft. Schließlich zwinkert sie orientierungslos und blickt dich an.{/n} "L-Lord Captain ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira zittert und erschlafft. Schließlich zwinkert sie orientierungslos und blickt dich an.{/n} "L-Lord Captain ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tressaille, puis tout son corps devient flasque. Elle cligne des yeux d'un air désorienté et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « {mf|S-seigneur-capitaine|S-seigneure-capitaine}... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira tressaille, puis tout son corps devient flasque. Elle cligne des yeux d'un air désorienté et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « {mf|S-seigneur-capitaine|S-seigneure-capitaine}... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira irkilip kaskatı kesiliyor. Sonra gözlerini kırpıştırıyor, sersemlemiş bir şekilde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shudders and goes limp. Then she blinks, disoriented, and looks at you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain..."
